forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Cloudy. Low around 32, with temperatures rising to around 38 overnight. South wind around 12 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered rain showers after 7am. Mostly cloudy. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 41 in the afternoon. Southwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 37 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

weather_report:
As the early morning hours blanket Boston in a veil of muted darkness, the air carries a distinct chill, with temperatures hovering near the freezing mark. A whisper of a south wind stirs the stillness, promising a subtle shift as daylight draws near. The day ahead holds a mixture of clouds and scattered showers, with temperatures peeking into the high fifties before gracefully retreating to the lower forties by afternoon. Those venturesome souls stepping out might find their spirits lifted by the anticipation of rain, though the gusty winds—dancing at 14 mph and occasionally flaring up to 37 mph—remind us that Mother Nature is anything but predictable.

As the day unfolds, consider donning layers that can adapt to the shifting temperatures. A light waterproof jacket would serve well against unexpected splatters from above, while a cozy sweater can provide comfort as that brisk breeze brushes past. The ambience may not beg for outdoor explorations, yet there is beauty in the simplicity of an afternoon stroll along the Charles, where reflections of the city’s muted colors shimmer, or perhaps an inviting corner café where a warm drink can be savored in the companionship of a good book. The world awakens slowly, wrapped in clouds, yet life persists, offering quiet moments that can be appreciated amidst the ebb and flow of this whimsical weather.
